channel.title: Carloop SALE on Massdrop!
channel.description:
Here's the deal: Massdrop is offering Carloop on their DIY-Tech category for a discount during their 7 day drop.
If you were thinking about getting Carloop at a discounted price for a group buy, your meetup group or makerspace this is a great opportunity to do so.
Deal starts 4/19/2017 and ends 4/26/2017. The more people join the lower the cost.
https://www.massdrop.com/buy/carloop-starter-kits-basic-bluetooth-3g
